sent.orig: The longest river in Britain is the Severn River. The most important river is Thames River.
sent.trans: 英国最长的河流是赛文河，最重要的河流是泰晤士河。

sent.orig: Major rivers have Xiao River, white river, river, as the word people are Fenhe water.
sent.trans: 主要河流有潇河、白马河、人字河等，均属汾河水系。

sent.orig: Changjiang River, also known as the Yangtze River, is the longest river in China.
sent.trans: 长江，又名扬子江，是中国最长的河流。

sent.orig: Other Renyi River, two-tank River, a tributary of Jiaokou River.
sent.trans: 其他还有仁义河、双池河、交口河等支流。

sent.orig: Larger rivers have rung River, bai cun River, River Hill cross.
sent.trans: 较大河流有响水河、柏村河、山交河。
